title: quarkus-oidc: ID token verification failure: null
body:
### Describe the bug

The console shows an error `ERROR [io.qua.oid.run.CodeAuthenticationMechanism] (vert.x-eventloop-thread-3) ID token verification failure: null` when page http://localhost:8080 is called on the second start of the application.

### Expected behavior

_No response_

### Actual behavior

_No response_

### How to Reproduce?

[reproducer.zip](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/files/11346542/reproducer.zip)

1. `./mvnw quarkus:dev`
2. http://localhost:8080/
3. Login
4. Kill the application
5. `./mvnw quarkus:dev`
6. http://localhost:8080/

=> `ERROR [io.qua.oid.run.CodeAuthenticationMechanism] (vert.x-eventloop-thread-3) ID token verification failure: null`

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

Java 17

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.0.1.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Maven
